name: Google Antigravity IDE
description: Google's free AI-powered development platform that represents their entry into the 'agent-first' coding tools space, featuring autonomous coding agents powered by Gemini 3 that can write, test, and debug applications while developers delegate complex tasks.
community_quotes: Google just released the IDE that could end coding as we know it and it's completely free
An 'agent-first' coding tool built for the next generation of AI-powered software development
Described as an AI-driven coding environment that represents a new era in intelligent development
Built on Gemini 3 with autonomous coding capabilities that go beyond traditional code completion
